content.raw:
I have a model that has two collisions: mug_cap_collision and mug_collision. In the viewer the boundingbox appears to be alright, but when I ask for the boundingbox of the mug model, it's actually equal to the box of the cap only (which is a plane on top of the mug, so the zlength is very small) and doesn't take into account the whole mug.

I'm using Gazebo 3.0 (from source) on Ubuntu 12.04
content.html:
I have a model that has two collisions: mug_cap_collision and mug_collision. In the viewer the boundingbox appears to be alright, but when I ask for the boundingbox of the mug model, it's actually equal to the box of the cap only (which is a plane on top of the mug, so the zlength is very small) and doesn't take into account the whole mug.

I'm using Gazebo 3.0 (from source) on Ubuntu 12.04
